summary: Small tweaks to the sky and clouds of amazing Antique Dragon ENB
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[size=3]Antique Dragon ENB is one of the best I've ever played with!
Extremely performance friendly and beautiful
I decided to make a few tweaks to the sky and clouds mainly, to add more realistic feeling, colors and atmosphere to it.
Mod changes only vanilla weathers. 
The rest of Antique Dragon ENB remains untouched.


[/size][size=4]Big thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14844589/?tb=mods&pUp=1]ZwabberdieBo[/url] for permission![/size]



[u]Some of very nice comments:[/u]

"Great work Hildi [img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/thumbsup.gif[/img] Not every one likes the signature blue skies of Antique Dragon. This mod is for them [img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/biggrin.gif[/img]"
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14844589]ZwabberdieBo[/url], author of Antique Dragon ENB


"Thank you! Thank you! Thank you! [img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/smile.gif[/img]
I am a bit familiar with tweaking ENB`s, but i was afraid about all the weathers i had to tweak to make the sky brighter.
You`ve done the job for me, and i am very thankful. "
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5560318]Diotima[/url]


"Antique Dragon was already stunningly beautiful, and desaturating the blue skies made it even more gorgeous. Thank you!"
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/43607067]Siguror[/url] 


"Wow, that's seems to be exactly what I wanted to have for this preset."
"Cooperation awesomeness over 9000 [img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/smile.gif[/img]"
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30658615]DonProtein[/url]


"Heya Hildigard, much thanks for this. I've been using Antique Dragon since it came out too and have been really happy with it.
Downloading your preset and will endorse as soon as Nexus will let me. +10000 for the cooperation between yourself and Z :-)"
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10759913]chrishpz[/url]


"Thanks for this mod Hildigard. I very much enjoy the changes."
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1379833]samfgjghk

[/url]

[u]Description:
[/u]
I tried to write a description, but there is too much.
Some general changes are in the comment section, you can read sticky post
Down below you can check some of screenshots.
More in the images section.

If you want me to make some changes, updates and fixes you can post your screenshots and leave a comment

[size=3]And more and more and more for snow and storms and more
All you can find in images section.


[u]Requirements:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83091/?]Antique Dragon ENB[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14844589/?tb=mods&pUp=1]ZwabberdieBo[/url]
and all its requirements
Endorse his amazing work!


[u]How to install: [/u]
1. Copy all files to Skyrim/enbseries folder
2. Overwrite
[s]3. Go to Data/enbseries.ini
Under [TIMEOFDAY] change DayTime=13.0 to DayTime=11.0[/s]


[u]How to uninstall:[/u]
Copy back files from oryginal mod and overwrite
[s]Don't forget to change [TIMEOFDAY] back to 13.0[/s]


Credits:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83091/?]Antique Dragon ENB[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/14844589/?tb=mods&pUp=1]ZwabberdieBo[/url]
He's the best!
